definitions.definition: The act of apportioning or the state of being apportioned .
The distribution of members of the House of Representatives according to the population of the various states .
The allocation of direct taxation according to the population of the various states.

main_definition: The act of apportioning or the state of being apportioned .
secondary_definitions: ( US ) The distribution of members of the House of Representatives according to the population of the various states .
( US ) The allocation of direct taxation according to the population of the various states.
